sense.def:
Z izrazom
how
vprašamo ali govorimo o načinu, na katerega je nekaj narejeno.

seg.quote: How did you know about this?
Tell me how to get there.
A lot depends on how the Americans handle the situation.

sense.def:
Izraz
how
uporabimo, kadar nekoga vprašamo, ali je bilo nekaj uspešno ali prijetno.

Z izrazom
how
tudi povprašamo ali govorimo o zdravju neke osebe.

seg.quote: I'm going to see how Davis is.

sense.def:
Izraz
how
uporabljamo v vzklikih, da poudarimo pridevnik, prislov ali trditev.

Z izrazom
how
vprašamo ali govorimo o meri, količini ali kakovosti.

seg.quote: How far is Amity from here?
How much does this lot cost?
That shows how much energy is available.

sense.def:
‘How about you?’
rečemo, kadar nekoga povprašamo o njegovem mnenju.

seg.quote: How about you, Dorothy, what do you want?
